title.narrative: PROGRAMME COORDINATION

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes., which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF Iraq Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet standards in achieving results for children.

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes.

description.narrative: A review of the Country Programme 2020-2024 took place at the end of 2021 to generate feedback on current programme strategies in an evolving real-world context, to adapt programmes and accelerate progress towards the achievement of outcomes for children. The discussions will inform the adjustments of the Country Programme in 2022. UNICEF, as the lead of the strategic priority 3 of the UNSCDF, played a key role in the revision of the UN cooperation framework which integrates the Durable solutions as a fifth pillar. Coordination with UNHCR was improved to accelerate the Blueprint planned results in Iraq. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2022
